headline: Pressure builds on Brnovich to act
author: Nick Phillips
sentences: Once derided as “useless” by figures near Donald Trump for shooting down election conspiracy theories, Attorney General Mark Brnovich has maintained a cautious silence as he faces another round of calls for action from his own party related the 2020 election audit.
